childMarkdownRemark.html: Stan Ruecker, Assistant Professor of Humanities Computing at the University of Alberta and a member of the Mellon-funded Nora Text Mining and Visualization project MITH and HCIL participate in, will be visiting the campus on Thursday, June 8. Ruecker is a specialist in experimental interface and visualization design in humanities contexts; he will present an informal overview of his work at MITH at 10:30 on Thursday. All are welcome to attend.

Stan Ruecker, Assistant Professor of Humanities Computing at the University of Alberta and a member of the Mellon-funded Nora Text Mining and Visualization project, is a specialist in experimental interface and visualization design in humanities contexts.
